title: More type assistence
content:
Hi guys. i'm looking a typefaces that's looks like something like this.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214101109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_8099_4512_25540_3610.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214101109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ronsbol_2_5764.jpg)
author: csjDK

comments.content:
I think the top one may be called 'Pharma'.

Why do you want ones that look something like that? what is wrong with those? Pharma looks good to me.

Nick Cooke
Where did you find the font? I tried googling and nothing came up. I thought maybe it was a custom and he wanted something similar because it wasn't available.

Download the Kontrapunkt font for PC (ZIP, 144 Kb): contains Kontrapunkt Light / Kontrapunkt Light Italic / Kontrapunkt Bold (OTF)  
 [http://www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize\_2004/Kontrapunkt-PC.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214101109/http:/www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize_2004/Kontrapunkt-PC.zip "http://www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize\_2004/Kontrapunkt-PC.zip")

Download the Kontrapunkt font for MAC (SIT, 168 Kb): contains Kontrapunkt Light / Kontrapunkt Light Italic / Kontrapunkt Bold  
 [http://www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize\_2004/Kontrapunkt-Mac.sit](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214101109/http:/www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize_2004/Kontrapunkt-Mac.sit "http://www.kontrapunkt.com/news/ddprize\_2004/Kontrapunkt-Mac.sit")

Please feel free to use the font - just don’t resell it. And please drop us a line if you use the font.

[http://www.kontrapunkt.dk/news/ddprize\_typeface\_of\_the\_year\_2004#downloads](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214101109/http:/www.kontrapunkt.dk/news/ddprize_typeface_of_the_year_2004#downloads "http://www.kontrapunkt.dk/news/ddprize\_typeface\_of\_the\_year\_2004#downloads")

Kontrapunkt font is one thing, and pharma font other. Steeze is looking for the last one. The link I posted is about an identity programme developed by kontrapunkt brand agency. They created pharma font for this identity.
